title: Anyamal Tantei Kiruminzoo
original_name: あにゃまる探偵 キルミンずぅ
ending_song: #1: "ช่วยมัดหน่อย (Chuai Mad Noi) (チュアイ　マッ　ノーイ)" by Neko Jump (eps 1-29)
sinopse: While searching for a run-away cat the twins Riko and Rimu Mikogami find a strange device that transforms them into "Kirumin." It also enables them to turn into real animals. Their older sister Nagisa soon joins them. Now the three have cute, funny and sometimes dangerous adventures.
